titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the situation in Haiti.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

bill.summary: 9/22/1994--Introduced. Supports the return of Jean Bertrand Aristide as President of Haiti. Urges the Haitian military to ensure a peaceful transition. Calls for: (1) the earliest possible retirement of certain Haitian military leaders; and (2) the President of the United States to return to the United States at the earliest practicable date all U.S. armed forces (except those participating in long-term peacekeeping activities with the United Nations).
